text: Moses ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn tuavir kamning isa ian damazibar aning arɨsi. Eghtɨ datɨrɨghɨn ia aningɨn tam amɨsefegh. Ia manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Ikiavɨra Itir God, deravɨra ia damuasa ia ifongez, o a ian arazir kuraba bagh ia gasɨghasɨghasa ia ifonge? Ikiavɨra Itir God ia amangɨtɨ, ia tintinibar Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar tongɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ bizir kurar kaba ia bativtɨ, ia tuavir kɨ ia mɨkemezir kamning uam aning gɨnɨghnɨgham.
